name: Accent Energy Carbon Kayak Paddle
description: A carbon paddle that offers the ergonomics of a bent paddle without added cost. Its full carbon shaft features moulded grips that keep your wrists in a relaxed more ergonomic position. The Kingpin connection system is durable and offers 12 different paddling angles.Carbon reinforced APX (polymer blend) blades are stiff, durable and light.Carbon fiber shaft provides high strength to weight ratio.Advantage Grip 7° wrist offset angle lessens forearm, wrist and shoulder fatigue.Kingpin connection system offers 12 blade angle settingsThe Advantage grip is made of a soft rubber material, that when held, reduces wrist, forearm and shoulder strain.
